review_blob:
A very light IPA, not a good example of the style.  Very low bitterness, low hop aroma, no maltiness, no head.

Did not enjoy.

Had this brew many times while in Tampa.  Pours a nice frothy head with a dark copper color.  Very nice, sharp hop nose with some citrus overtones.  Goes down very easy.  Hop flavor is balanced and not too raw for me.  I love this ipa more than dogfish head 60min IPA
beer_name: Tampa Bay Old Elephant Foot IPA
